Timebattle

Activation-Dectection Criteria

Activation: You lose the territory this trap is laid in
Detection: Your opponent has an effect in play that nullifies effects which target their capital.

On Activation

This card is placed as a terrain feature which cannot be replaced, except by the effect of another card. Your opponent's capital moves to this location and becomes cursed with the following effect:

All cards within the territory can only be used every other turn

On Dectection

This card is placed on the bottom of your opponents deck.

card variation

Trap

Scarcity

Founder's Deck

History

The days grew long and the king looked longingly out into a city, once grand, now in dismay. His pride goaded him into challenging an enemy he knew, in his heart, he could not beat. He watched his wife parish, children leave, and town crumble. Though he and his noble steed slayed the dragon of his youth, this king's folly left ruin where once a society thrived. The dawn broke, and he prepared for his last journey beyond the walls. His enemy knew of the surrender long before word spread among his people. As he traveled, the former king remembered how to act and where to go. Since he was a mere boy, he was groomed for the journey. Perhaps the successor, should there be a successor, lead his kingdom away from the demons among the walls.
